purpose: This document provides a machine-readable representation of the current, stable state of the application's source code. It is intended for direct consumption by LLM coding agents to understand the codebase structure, function signatures, and state management without parsing natural language. This file must be updated automatically whenever the source code in 'docu.md' is changed.

exports.name: tokenizeSentences
exports.description: Splits a text into an array of sentences using Intl.Segmenter for German.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The input text to be segmented.

exports.name: tokenizeWords
exports.description: Splits a text into an array of words using Intl.Segmenter for German.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The input text to be segmented.

exports.name: getNGrams
exports.description: Generates n-grams from an array of tokens.

exports.name: lowerCase
exports.description: Converts a string to lower case.

exports.name: upperCase
exports.description: Converts a string to upper case.

modules.description: Handles parsing and processing of SKOS vocabularies in Turtle format.

exports.name: processTurtleContent
exports.description: Parses a Turtle string, extracts skos:Concepts, and returns maps of concepts and labels.

returns.description: An array containing two objects: [conceptsMap, labelsMap].

modules.description: Implements the CISTEM stemmer for the German language.

exports.name: stem
exports.description: Performs stemming on a single German word.

parameters.name: case_insensitive
parameters.description: Flag to ignore case. Defaults to false.

exports.name: generateStemmedLabelsMap
exports.description: Creates a map of stemmed labels from a given labelsMap.

parameters.name: labelsMap
parameters.description: A map where keys are labels and values are arrays of concept URIs.

modules.description: Pinia store for managing the application's global state.

state.name: conceptsMap
state.description: Map of SKOS concepts generated by rdf.js.

state.name: labelsMap
state.description: Map of labels to concept URIs.

state.name: stemmedLabelsMap
state.description: Map of stemmed labels to concept URIs.

state.name: annotationResultObject
state.description: The result object from the annotation pipeline.

state.name: tableResultObject
state.description: Annotation results formatted for the UI table.
